humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'LYMPH NODE STATUS: SEVEN LYMPH NODES, NO EVIDENCE OF MALIGNANCY (0/7)', which means that out of the seven lymph nodes assessed, none of them had evidence of malignancy. This matches the criteria for N0 as per the new rules 10 and 11, which indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes, or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the modified radical mastectomy specimen showed no residual invasive carcinoma and negative surgical margins. Seven lymph nodes were examined and found to be free of malignancy (0/7). Therefore, the patient's pathologic N stage is N0 (no regional lymph node metastasis).
